product_description: A slightly stretchy, partially sheer bralette is highlighted with rich, cross-dyed lace and supported with a sleek elastic band.
product_details_and_care:
A slightly stretchy, partially sheer bralette is highlighted with rich, cross-dyed lace and supported with a sleek elastic band. A J-hook at back converts the cut to a racerback style.
Back J-hook converts straps to racerback
Nylon/spandex
Hand wash, dry flat
Imported

product_size_info: Offers light support for most A-C cup sizes.
